sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Getty images/AP

Ụlọakụ Etiti bụ 'Central Bank of Nigeria' (CBN) agwala ụlọakụ ọbụla dị na Naijiria ka ha tinye anya na mmiri were na-enyocha ego na azụmahia si mba Cameroon, Croatia na Vietnam iji nyọpụta ndị na-asa ego, ndị na-etinye ego iji kwado iyi ndụ egwu nakwa itinye ego nrụpụta maọbụ nkesa ngwa agha nuklia,kemikal na nke dị ndu.
Uru ise di na mgbanwe ego China'9 Mee 2018
New Naira design: Ụlọikpe Kachasị akwụsịla CBN na Gọọmentị Etiti iwepu ego ochie n'ụbọchị Feb 109 Febụwarị 2023

N'akwụkwọ ozi nwere akara FPR/AML/PUB/BOF/001/029, nke onyeisi na-ahụ maka iwu metụtara okwu ego n'ụlọakụ CBN bụ Mr Chibuzo Efobi binyere akara ma wepụta ụbọchị Tọzde kwuru sị, na nke a so na mkpebi nke otu 'Financial Action Task Force' FAFT) nwere n'ọgbakọ ha na nsonso a.

Otu 'Financial Action Task Force' bụ otu mba ụwa na-ahụ maka itinye atụmatụ nakwa usoro iji gbochie isa ego, iyi ndụ egwu nakwa itinye ego na ịrụ ngwa agha nuklia , nke kemikal maọbụ ndụ (nuclear, chemical or biological weapons.)
Ebe foto si, CBN

“Anya ụlọakụ na  ụlọ ego ndị ọzọ rue  na mpụtara  ọgbakọ nke otu "Financial Action Task Force" nwere n'abalị 21 rue abalị 23 nke ọnwa Juun afọ 2023 nakwa ntinye e tinyere Cameroon, Croatia na Vietnam  n'aha ebe ndị 'a ga-elesi anya ike'."
“Ọzọ, aha mba Korea, Iran na Myanmar ka nọkwa n'aakwụkwọ obodo ndị a 'kachasị elesi anya ike'.
“Ụlọakụ mụrụ anya  maka nsogbu nwere ike ịdapụta dịka ndị mmadụ na-achọ ụzọ, ịgba iwu a mgba okpuru iji chekwa usoro nhazi ego na mbaụwa."
Cheta na n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2023, Naijiria dabanyere n'akwụkwọ mba ndị FAFT na-enyo enyo.
